A world peace symbol - I would draw a world peace symbol to bring about an end to all conflicts and promote unity and harmony among all people.
A cure for cancer - I would draw a cure for cancer to end the suffering of millions of people who are affected by this deadly disease.
A time machine - I would draw a time machine to explore the past and the future and learn from history and the future to improve the present.
A superhero - I would draw a superhero to protect the world from all threats and dangers and to inspire people to be brave and courageous.
A utopian city - I would draw a utopian city to create a perfect society where everyone lives in peace, happiness, and prosperity.
